welcomeScreen.subtitle: We've rebuilt our app to make it easier to view the schedule, explore the city, and access need-to-know details!

gerdingTheater.title:
PORTLAND'S
GERDING THEATER
gerdingTheater.description: The spacious Gerding Theater, located in Portland's bustling downtown city-center, is the ideal location for a single-track conference like Chain React.

gettingToChainReact.subtitle: GETTING TO CHAIN REACT
gettingToChainReact.description1: The closest airport is Portland Intertation Airport (PDX), a one-hour flight from San Francisco. From New York, PDX is more like a six or seven-hour flight, depending on connections. Think of all that email you can catch up on.
gettingToChainReact.description2: Upon arriving at PDX, take a taxi, Uber, or Lyft to your hotel. It's an easy 10-minute ride to The Benson Hotel. Once you're at your hotel, grabbing a Lyft or Uber is a breeze, so no need to rent a car.

wifi.title: WIFI NETWORK
wifi.description: Git clone, Slack, and surf cat videos to your heart's content!

sponsors.title: THANKS TO THIS YEAR'S SPONSORS
sponsors.description: Support from our amazing sponsors make Chain React possible!
